mapper.update: update mq_message_consumer set group_name = #{mqMessageConsumerLog.group_name}, msg_topic=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_topic}, msg_tag=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_tag}, msg_key=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_key}, msg_body=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_body}, consumer_status=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_status}, consumer_times=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_times}, consumer_time=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_time}, remark=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.remark} where id=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.id}

update mq_message_consumer set group_name = #{mqMessageConsumerLog.group_name}, msg_topic=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_topic}, msg_tag=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_tag}, msg_key=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_key}, msg_body=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.msg_body}, consumer_status=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_status}, consumer_times=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_times} + 1, consumer_time=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_time}, remark=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.remark} where id=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.id} and consumer_times=#{mqMessageConsumerLog.consumer_times}
